pkgmetadata.longdescription: flit_core---------This provides a `PEP 517 <https://peps.python.org/pep-0517/>`_ build backendfor packages using `Flit <https://pypi.org/project/flit/>`_. The only publicinterface is the API specified by PEP 517, at ``flit_core.buildapi``.See the `Flit documentation <https://flit.pypa.io/en/stable/>`_ for moreinformation.
